title: 新人报到
txt_content:
大家好~
刚刚开始玩MC和论坛
来和大家打个招呼

replies.author: 丨小酒窝丨
replies.txt_content:
欢迎新人~
记得多浏览版规哦

replies.author: HolographicHat
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人！记得多看版规哟

replies.author: yongcheng01
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人，记得遵守版规

replies.author: mohist
replies.txt_content: 你好呢新人，多多注意版规吧，欢迎！

replies.author: chencheng123
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人，多看版规少吃亏哦

replies.author: cybmp3
replies.txt_content:
欢迎萌新啊。
多看版规哟。

replies.author: 愿爱无界
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人！记得看规则哦~

replies.author: z327121579
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人，多看版规，不要灌水
